message: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
name: Nelson Mandela

message: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
name: Steve Jobs

message: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

message: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
name: John Lennon

message: I love three things in this world. Sun, Moon and You. Sun for morning, Moon for night, and You forever.
name: The Twilight Saga

message: This is Jinyi, welcome to leave me a message.
name: Jinyi Chen
